data.title: Vilhelmina Throw 130x170 cm, Ash Grey
data.meta_description: Buy undefined from Recycled by Wille  - always at a great price!
data.text:
The throw by Recycled by Wille has an environmentally friendly design in recycled polyester and recycled cotton with a waffled structure and fringes on the short sides. Use as a decoration in your bed or as a cosy touch in your armchair or sofa.

About the throw from Recycled by Wille

- Environmentally friendly design.

- Made of recycled cotton and recycled polyester.

- Waffled structure.

- Fringes on the short sides.

- Width: 1300 mm.

- Length: 1700 mm.

- Made in India

Care advice for the throw

- Machine wash 40ÂºC.

- Do not tumble dry.

- Do not bleach.

- Iron at high temperature.
